WpApiProvider
service in module wp-api-angularjs

Description

wp-api-angularjs provider

Methods

  • addInterceptor(func)

    Allow you to modify requests, responses or errors https://docs.angularjs.org/api/ng/service/$http#interceptors

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    funcfunction

    the interceptor definition

    Example

    WpApiProvider.addInterceptor(() => {
    return {
        response: (response) => {
            // DO something with the response here
            return response;
        }
    }
});

  • setBaseUrl(newBaseUrl)

    Set the webserver base url

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    newBaseUrlstring

    the url to the webservice

  • setBasicCredentials(login, password)

    Set the basic auth credentials during configuration. This is not recommended as it exposes credential out of the open. Please use WpApi.setBasicCredentials instead, with user input (this lib do not provides the form needed)

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    loginstring

    login

    passwordstring

    password

  • setDefaultHttpProperties(properties)

    Allow you to overwrite http defaults https://docs.angularjs.org/api/ng/service/$http#setting-http-headers

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    propertiesobject

    the properties to overwrite

    Example

    WpApiProvider.setDefaultHttpProperties({
    timeout: 20000
});
